name: kensho-tech
description: Kensho Tech - Premium Scoring Management System

scripts.clean: powershell -Command "taskkill /F /IM 'Kensho Tech.exe' /T 2>$null; taskkill /F /IM 'electron.exe' /T 2>$null; if (Test-Path dist_production) { Remove-Item -Path dist_production -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if (Test-Path dist_staging) { Remove-Item -Path dist_staging -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }"
scripts.build:secure: npm run clean && node obfuscate.js && cd dist_staging && npm install --production && npx electron-builder --projectDir ..

author: Kensho Tech
